title: Elijah Kurien
main_content: Elijah Kurien Building AI Agents and Robotics Software Engineering @ University of Waterloo Twitter LinkedIn GitHub Email Work Incoming Software Engineering Intern @ Wispr January 2025 - April 2025 Working on the ML team improving core dictation models and inference optimizations Investment Partner @ Dorm Room Fund October 2024 - Present Investing in the most promising students and recent dropouts. elijah [at] dormroomfund.com Engineering Intern @ General Cybernetics August 2024 - August 2024 Built a cellular incubator to modulate membrane voltage of cells to induce them to become stem cells Machine Learning Intern @ Omen April 2024 - August 2024 Built a microprocessor that estimates engine health based on frequency analysis of engine vibrations Machine Learning Intern @ Ceco.ai June 2023 - August 2023 Built predictive models to determine when mining companies would violate laws and regulations from satellite imagery Projects Waterloo Hacker Fab 2024 Founded a team building a low-cost semiconductor fab with $51,000 in grants. Currently working on building MOSFETs from silicon wafers Skyline 2024 Built an agent-based simulation for cities to model population movements and optimize public transit routes Engineer-4o 2024 Building AI code generation agents to make developers lives easier Self-Driving Car 2024 Built an autonomous car to delivery food across uWaterloo's campus. Created PID controls using RL and developed a world-modelling system for real-time correction Burrow 2024 Built a learning platform for students to create courses and knowledge graphs from anything they want Research Approximating the Navier-Stokes Equations with the Explicit Finite Difference Method to Solve the Lid-driven Cavity Flow Problem 2023 Evaluation of Brain-Derived Neurotrophic Factor Nanotherapies to Treat Alzheimer's Diseases 2023
